content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find my apartment quite satisfactory. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment seems to be in a prime location with excellent amenities nearby. However, I'm a student and I'm looking for the best deal possible. I'm hoping we can negotiate a price that is mutually beneficial. What is the lowest price you would consider for this apartment?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I always aim to get the best possible price for my properties. However, I'm willing to listen to your offer and negotiate a price that is fair for both parties. Please make your best offer, and we can discuss it further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mister Schmidt. As a student, I'm on a tight budget, so I'm hoping for a price that reflects my financial situation. I'm looking for a place that is not only affordable but also provides a comfortable living environment. Would you be willing to go as low as 600 Euros per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 600 Euros per month is quite a low offer considering the location and the amenities of the apartment. However, as a landlord, I'm open to negotiations. How long are you planning to stay in the apartment? Perhaps we can discuss a longer-term lease for a lower monthly rate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm looking to stay in the apartment for at least one year, possibly longer if the arrangement works out well. I understand that the location and amenities add value to the apartment, and I'm willing to pay a fair price that reflects that. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at 700 Euros per month for a one-year lease?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 700 Euros per month for a one-year lease is more in line with what I would consider a fair price for this apartment. It shows that you are serious about the place and willing to commit to a longer term. I'm willing to accept your offer of 700 Euros per month for a one-year lease.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Excellent, Mister Schmidt. I'm very pleased with your willingness to work with me on the price. The one-year lease at 700 Euros per month is agreeable. Thank you for your hospitality and for providing me with such a great living space. I look forward to a smooth and long-term arrangement. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
